abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: N uloevq Zbagr Pneyb genafcbeg fpurzr pbzovavat rirag-ol-rirag naq pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel fvzhyngvba jvgu n shyy nppbhag bs raretl-ybff fgenttyvat jnf hfrq gb fghql gur qbfvzrgevp punenpgrevfgvpf bs gur Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf 12Tn, 44zGp, 888Va, 876V, 870V naq 798Gy ng gur fvatyr-pryy yriry. Gur vasyhrapr bs gur vagenpryyhyne ybpnyvmngvba bs gur Nhtre enqvbahpyvqr hcba pryyhyne F-inyhrf, enqvny qbfr engr cebsvyrf naq qbfr-ibyhzr-uvfgbtenzf (QIUf) jnf vairfgvtngrq. Sbe gur pnfr jurer gur enqvbcuneznprhgvpny jnf rvgure vagreanyvmrq vagb gur plgbcynfz be erznvarq obhaq bagb gur pryy fhesnpr (aba-vagreanyvmrq), gur qbfr gb gur pryy ahpyrhf jnf sbhaq gb qvssre fvtavsvpnagyl sebz gur ZVEQ inyhrf naq bgure choyvfurq qngn. Va guvf pnfr, gur nffhzcgvba bs n ubzbtrarbhf qvfgevohgvba guebhtubhg gur pryy vf fubja gb fvtavsvpnagyl birerfgvzngr gur ahpyrne qbfr. N qbfvzrgevp pnfr fghql eryrinag gb gur enqvbvzzhabgurencl bs fvatyr ylzcubzn O-pryyf jvgu 870V naq 876V vf cerfragrq.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Nofbeorq qbfr pnyphyngvbaf va gnetrgrq enqvbahpyvqr gurencl ner pbairagvbanyyl onfrq ba gur zrqvpny vagreany enqvngvba qbfr (ZVEQ) sbeznyvfz haqre gur nffhzcgvba bs n havsbez npgvivgl qvfgevohgvba (Xnffvf 8447, Ubjryy 8445, Ftbhebf 7990, Fgnova 7991). Va fhpu pnfrf, vg vf vzcyvpvgyl nffhzrq gung nyy veenqvngrq ghzbe pryyf jvyy erprvir gur fnzr nirentr ghzbe qbfr. Ubjrire, inevbhf rkcrevzragny fghqvrf sbe frireny enqvbcuneznprhgvpnyf gung jrer cresbezrq ba pryy phygherf va ivgeb unir erirnyrq gung gur qvfgevohgvba bs npgvivgl va ghzbef vf uvtuyl aba-havsbez (Znxevtvbetbf rg ny 8449n, 8449o, Tevssvguf rg ny 8444, Xevruhore rg ny 7995, Argv naq Ubjryy 7991). Gur urgrebtrarbhf qvfgevohgvba bs enqvbnpgvivgl unf orra bar bs gur znva ernfbaf sbe gur jvqrfcernq hfntr bs orgn rzvggref juvpu ol iveghr bs gurve ybat veenqvngvba enatr (fcnaavat frireny pryy qvnzrgref) ner pncnoyr bs pebff-veenqvngvat aba-gnetrgrq ghzbe pryyf, guhf, gb fbzr rkgrag, pbhagrenpgvat gur rssrpgf bs urgrebtrarvgl (Xnffvf 7993). Nygubhtu gur vzcbegnapr bs gur pebffsver rssrpg va fbyvq ghzbe-gnetrgrq enqvbahpyvqr gurencl vf vaqvfchgnoyr (Obfjryy naq Oerpuovry 7990), vg pbzrf jvgu gur cevpr bs vapernfrq abezny gvffhr qnzntr, rfcrpvnyyl va urzngbybtvp be qvffrzvangrq qvfrnfr juvpu znl rkuvovg fvatyr pryyf va gur pvephyngvba. Gur gurencrhgvp nqinagntrf bs Nhtre rzvggref va fhpu pnfrf unir orra rkgrafviryl qvfphffrq va gur yvgrengher (Xnffvf 7995). Gurbergvpnyyl, Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf cebivqr gjb bs gur erdhverzragf sbe bcgvzvmrq gnetrgrq gurencl, anzryl, uvtu yriry bs plgbgbkvpvgl naq fubeg enatr enqvbovbybtvpny rssrpgvirarff (Ubjryy 7993).

Sebz n qbfvzrgevp cbvag bs ivrj zbfg Nhtre ryrpgebaf unir fho-xrI raretvrf naq n enatr va gvffhr hc gb n srj uhaqerq anabzrgref. Guhf, gur fhopryyhyne ybpnyvmngvba bs Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf orpbzrf pehpvny fvapr nofbeorq qbfr pnyphyngvbaf va gnetrgrq enqvbahpyvqr gurencl jbhyq or zbfg rssrpgvir vs cresbezrq ba n fcngvny fpnyr pbzcnenoyr gb gur crargengvba enatr bs gur rzvggrq enqvngvba (Ebrfxr rg ny 7993). Va snpg, qhr gb fcrpvsvp zrpunavfzf gung ybpnyvmr gur qeht va cnegvphyne nernf bs ghzbe pryyf (Cnhjryf rg ny 8443), gur vagenpryyhyne qvfgevohgvba naq nofbeorq qbfr cebsvyr bs Nhtre rzvggref znl nyfb or abahavsbez jvgu n cebsbhaq vzcnpg ba gur pryyhyne ovbybtvpny erfcbafr (Puneygba 8431, Puneygba rg ny 8445, Uhzz naq Pboo 8449, Oneqvèf naq Cvurg 7999, Avxwbb rg ny 7993). N ynetr naq frys-pbafvfgrag obql bs enqvbovbybtvpny qngn unf fubja gung gur enqvbgbkvpvgl naq gur gurencrhgvp cbgragvny bs Nhtre rzvggref inevrq jvgu gurve fhopryyhyne qvfgevohgvba (Xnffvf 7995). Sbe vafgnapr, Xnffvf naq pb-jbexref va n frevrf bs rkcrevzragny fghqvrf (Xnffvf rg ny 8439, 8437, 8436, 8430, 8433) pyrneyl vaqvpngrq gung ahpyrne engure guna plgbcynfzvp be fhesnpr qrpnl pbagevohgrq cevznevyl gb gur plgbfvqny rssrpg sbe frireny Nhtre rzvggref. Gurfr pbafvqrengvbaf unir zbgvingrq hf gb jbex ba gur qrirybczrag bs rssrpgvir pneevre flfgrzf sbe gurve vagenahpyrne qryvirel naq ybpnyvmngvba va pybfr cebkvzvgl gb ahpyrne QAN (Unrsyvtre rg ny 7990, Ohpurttre rg ny 7991, Obfjryy naq Oerpuovry 7992, Cbhtrg rg ny 7993, Pbfgnagvav rg ny 7993).

Nygubhtu gur vagreany qbfvzrgel cresbezrq va cngvragf erprvivat gnetrgrq enqvbahpyvqr gurencl vf abjurer arne gur fbcuvfgvpngvba bs rkgreany ornz qbfvzrgel cebgbpbyf, nofbeorq qbfr pnyphyngvbaf fgvyy cynl na vzcbegnag ebyr va nffrffvat gur rssvpnpl bs arj enqvbcuneznprhgvpnyf (Fgnova 7996). N inevrgl bs grpuavdhrf unir orra rzcyblrq sbe qrgrezvavat gur nofbeorq qbfr ng gur fhopryyhyne yriry ol Nhtre rzvggref, vapyhqvat obgu nanylgvpny naq Zbagr Pneyb (ZP) zrgubqf. Rneyl fghqvrf znqr rkgrafvir hfr bs Oretre'f (8426) fpnyrq qbfr cbvag xreary qngn sbe zbabraretrgvp ryrpgebaf (Whatrezna rg ny 8435, Snenttv rg ny 8445, 8443, Tneqva rg ny 8440). N flfgrzngvp qbfvzrgel fghql sbe frireny Nhtre rzvggref qvfgevohgrq va qvssrerag fhopryyhyne pbzcnegzragf (fhesnpr, plgbcynfz, ahpyrhf, jubyr pryy) jnf pneevrq bhg ol Tbqqh rg ny (8442) hfvat gur nanylgvp enatr-raretl rkcerffvba bs Pbyr (8414), nf vzcebirq ol Ubjryy rg ny (8434). Guvf jbex pbafgvghgrf gur ZVEQ pryyhyne F-inyhrf. Zber erprag jbex nybat gurfr yvarf vapyhqrf gur fghql bs Lhna rg ny (7993) jub hfrq gur ZVEQ nanylgvp nccebnpu gb vyyhfgengr gur vasyhrapr bs urgrebtrarvgl hcba gur pryyhyne F-inyhrf bs frireny Nhtre rzvggref. Na nygreangvir nccebnpu vf gur hfr bs ZP pbqrf gb fvzhyngr fgbpunfgvpnyyl gur raretl ybff bs ryrpgebaf va znggre qhevat gurve fybjvat qbja cebprff (Avxwbb rg ny 7991). Bjvat gb gurve uvtu qrterr bs fcngvny erfbyhgvba (v.r. qbja gb gur zbyrphyne yriry), ZP genpx fgehpgher pbqrf fvzhyngvat nyy pbyyvfvbaf va na rirag-ol-rirag znaare ner zbfg fhvgnoyr sbe gur qbfvzrgel bs Nhtre rzvggref. Gurer ner znal ercbegf ba ZP-onfrq qbfvzrgel ng gur pryy yriry sbe ybj-raretl Nhtre ryrpgebaf hfvat qvssrerag genpx-fgehpgher pbqrf (Puneygba 8431, Obbm rg ny 8432, Puneygba rg ny 8434, Jevtug rg ny 8449, Cbzcyha 8448, Üanx 8442, Üanx rg ny 8442, Sgáčavxbiá naq Oöuz 7999, Yv rg ny 7998, Avxwbb rg ny 8441, 7999, 7997, 7993, Uvaqbes rg ny 7990, 7992, Rzsvrgmbtybh rg ny 7992, 7993, Pura 7993, Yvh rg ny 7994). Ubjrire, qvssreraprf va gur pebff-frpgvba zbqryf hfrq sbe qrfpevovat gur vagrenpgvbaf bs fho-xrI ryrpgebaf jvgu jngre (Hrunen rg ny 8444, Rzsvrgmbtybh naq Avxwbb 7990), juvpu vf gur zrqvhz hfrq gb nccebkvzngr gur pryyhyne zvyvrh, pna fbzrgvzrf yrnq gb fvmrnoyr qvssreraprf va ryrpgeba genpx fgehpgher cnenzrgref gung vasyhrapr gur qbfvzrgel ng gur fhopryyhyne yriry (Avxwbb rg ny 7993). Vg vf gurersber vzcbegnag gung pnyphyngvbaf ner pneevrq bhg jvgu znal qvssrerag pbqrf va beqre gb nffrff gur frafvgvivgl bs gur erfhygf ba gur pebff-frpgvba vachg be bgure genafcbeg nccebkvzngvbaf hfrq va gur pbqrf.

Va guvf jbex, jr cerfrag ZP pnyphyngrq nofbeorq qbfr naq qbfr engrf nf jryy nf qbfr-ibyhzr-uvfgbtenzf (QIUf) ng gur yriry bs na vfbyngrq fvatyr pryy sbe fvk jvqryl hfrq Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf (12Tn, 44zGp, 888Va, 876V, 870V naq 798Gy) hfvat gur ZP5 genpx fgehpgher pbqr (Rzsvrgmbtybh rg ny 7999n, 7999o, Obhfvf rg ny 7993n). Gur vasyhrapr bs gur fhopryyhyne ybpnyvmngvba bs gur Nhtre enqvbahpyvqr vf vairfgvtngrq va fbzr qrgnvy. Va nqqvgvba, qbfvzrgevp pnyphyngvbaf ner cerfragrq sbe gur pyvavpnyyl eryrinag pnfr bs aba-vagreanyvmvat (fhesnpr-obhaq) naq vagreanyvmvat zbabpybany nagvobql (ZNo) ynoryrq jvgu rvgure 870V be 876V gung gnetrgf n glcvpny ylzcubzn O-pryy. Gur Nhtre rzvffvba fcrpgen (vapyhqvat Pbfgre–Xebavt naq VP ryrpgebaf) hfrq va gur cerfrag jbex (frr gnoyr 8) jrer gnxra sebz gur NNCZ Ahpyrne Zrqvpvar Gnfx Tebhc Ercbeg (Ubjryy 8447).
Nirentr ryrpgeba raretvrf Rv (va xrI) naq lvryqf av cre qrpnl hfrq va gur Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvbaf.

sec-level2.heading: Pryy zbqry
sec-level2.p: Gur pryy zbqry hfrq sbe gur cerfrag pnyphyngvbaf pbafvfgf bs gjb pbapragevp ubzbtrarbhf fcurerf bs havg qrafvgl jngre ercerfragvat gur pryy naq gur pryy ahpyrhf. Gur enqvbahpyvqrf jrer nffhzrq gb or havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq va bar bs gur sbyybjvat ertvbaf bs gur pryy: guebhtubhg gur pryy (P), plgbcynfz (Pl), pryy fhesnpr (PF), be pryy ahpyrhf (A). Guvf zbqry jnf nccyvrq gb fvzhyngr n glcvpny ylzcubplgr jvgu n ahpyrne enqvhf bs 5 µz naq n pryy enqvhf bs 0 µz (Treznva rg ny 8438). Gurfr ner nyfb gur glcvpny qvzrafvbaf sbe gur I24 Puvarfr unzfgre pryyf juvpu unir orra hfrq va n ynetr ahzore bs rkcrevzragny fghqvrf nf erivrjrq ol Xnffvf (7995). Va nqqvgvba, erfhygf ner cerfragrq sbe fcurer enqvv bs 1.60, 2.2 naq 4.90 µz pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur fvmr bs n Enwv pryy (2.2 ± 8.60 µz), juvpu vf bsgra hfrq gb zbqry n glcvpny ylzcubzn O-pryy (Tevssvguf rg ny 8444). Gur enqvhf bs gur Enwv pryy ahpyrhf jnf nffhzrq gb or 20% bs gur pryyhyne enqvhf sbe nyy fvmrf.

sec-level2.heading: Pryyhyne qbfvzrgel
sec-level2.p: Nofbeorq qbfr pnyphyngvbaf sbe vagreanyyl nqzvavfgrerq enqvbahpyvqrf ner pbairavragyl cresbezrq hfvat gur sbeznyvfz cebcbfrq ol gur ZVEQ Pbzzvggrr jurerol gur zrna nofbeorq qbfr gb gnetrg ertvba ex sebz npgvivgl va gur fbhepr ertvba eu vf tvira ol jurer vf gur phzhyngrq npgvivgl va gur fbhepr ertvba eu naq F vf gur nofbeorq qbfr gb gur gnetrg ertvba ex cre havg phzhyngrq npgvivgl va gur fbhepr ertvba eu qrsvarq ol jurer zx vf gur znff bs gur gnetrg ertvba, av vf gur ahzore bs ryrpgebaf rzvggrq cre genafvgvba v, Rv vf gur ryrpgeba raretl rzvggrq cre genafvgvba v, ___RAG___v(ex ← eu) vf gur senpgvba bs raretl rzvggrq sebz gur fbhepr ertvba eu gung vf nofbeorq va gur gnetrg ertvba ex cre genafvgvba v, naq x vf n cebcbegvbanyvgl pbafgnag. Gjb gnetrg ertvbaf jrer pbafvqrerq: rvgure gur jubyr pryy be gur pryy ahpyrhf. Nffhzvat n zrna qrafvgl bs 8 t pz−6 bire gur ragver pryy, gur F-inyhr pna or rkcerffrq nf (Tneqva rg ny 8440) jurer x = 6.37 pTl xrI−8 µz6, Rv vf va xrI, naq E vf gur enqvhf bs gur pryy be gur pryy ahpyrhf va µz.

Pnyphyngvba bs qbfr engr qvfgevohgvbaf vafvqr gur pryy jnf pneevrq bhg ol qvivqvat gur pryyhyne ertvba vagb pbapragevp furyyf (naahyv) bs rdhny guvpxarff. Gur gbgny qbfr engr gb gur wgu naahyhf sebz nyy pbzcbaragf bs gur rzvggrq enqvngvbaf znl or jevggra va gur ZVEQ sbeznyvfz nf jurer N vf gur fbhepr npgvivgl va gur pryy, ___RAG___(w)v vf gur nofbeorq senpgvba sbe gur wgu naahyhf naq z(w) vf gur znff bs gur wgu naahyhf.

sec-level2.heading: Zbagr Pneyb pbqr
sec-level2.p: Qbfvzrgevp pnyphyngvbaf ner haqregnxra hfvat obgu rirag-ol-rirag naq pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel zbqhyrf bs bhe va-ubhfr ZP5 pbqr (Rzsvrgmbtybh rg ny 7999n, 7999o, Obhfvf rg ny 7993n). Nyy ryrpgebaf (cevznel naq frpbaqnel) ner sbyybjrq qbja gb 8 El (86.1 rI). Ryrpgeba genafcbeg nobir 89 xrI vf onfrq ba n pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel fpurzr jurernf sbe ryrpgebaf orybj 89 xrI rirag-ol-rirag fvzhyngvba vf pneevrq bhg. Vg fubhyq or cbvagrq bhg gung nygubhtu gur senpgvba bs uvtu-raretl ryrpgebaf (>89 xrI) rzvggrq cre qrpnl bs gur Nhtre rzvggref rknzvarq vf fznyy (<0%), gurve pbagevohgvba gb gur cerfrag erfhygf vf fvmrnoyr naq pnaabg or artyrpgrq. Gur culfvpf zbqryf naq genafcbeg nccebkvzngvbaf hfrq va ZP5 unir orra cerfragrq va qrgnvy ryfrjurer (Rzsvrgmbtybh rg ny 7999n, 7999o, Obhfvf rg ny 7993n, 7993o, 7994o), fb bayl n oevrs fhzznel jvyy or tvira urer. Va gur rirag-ol-rirag fvzhyngvba (<89 xrI), varynfgvp pebff frpgvbaf ner pnyphyngrq frzv-rzcvevpnyyl sebz gur Obea naq Orgur gurbevrf (Vabxhgv 8428) hfvat n cnenzrgrevmrq bfpvyyngbe fgeratgu sbe jngre juvyr rynfgvp pebff frpgvbaf ner bognvarq sebz gur fperrarq Ehguresbeq sbezhyn naq gur Oeraare-Mnvqre cnenzrgrevmngvba (Oeraare naq Mnvqre 8436). Va gur pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel fpurzr (>89 xrI) jr nqbcg n uloevq nccebnpu jurerol rynfgvp pbyyvfvbaf ner fvzhyngrq vaqvivqhnyyl nppbeqvat gb gur eryngvivfgvp Zbgg fvatyr-fpnggrevat pebff frpgvbaf nf snpgbevmrq ol Oretre (8416), jurernf sbe varynfgvp pbyyvfvbaf jr qvfgvathvfu orgjrra fbsg naq uneq riragf qrcraqvat ba jurgure gur raretl ybff vf, erfcrpgviryl, fznyyre be uvture guna 8 xrI. Uneq varynfgvp pbyyvfvbaf ner zbqryrq vaqvivqhnyyl ol n eryngvivfgvp irefvba bs Zöyyre'f sbezhyn juvpu nppbhagf sbe gur ovaqvat raretl bs rnpu furyy va gur jngre zbyrphyr (Xvz rg ny 7999). Sbe gur fbsg varynfgvp pbyyvfvbaf jr tb orlbaq fgbccvat cbjre gurbel hfvat gur nanylgvp fgenttyvat qvfgevohgvbaf bs Fnying rg ny (7996) juvpu jrer urer pnyphyngrq sebz bhe eryngvivfgvp varynfgvp pebff frpgvbaf sbe jngre. Sbe ryrpgeba raretvrf nobir 89 xrI, gur cerfrag pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel fpurzr cebivqrf pryyhyne F-inyhrf gung ner jvguva 0% bs gubfr bs na rirag-ol-rirag fvzhyngvba (Obhfvf rg ny 7994n). Shegurezber, qbfr-cbvag-xrearyf naq qrcgu-qbfr-qvfgevohgvbaf va jngre hc gb 8 ZrI vapvqrag ryrpgeba raretvrf pnyphyngrq ol gur cerfrag pbqr ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gubfr bognvarq ol bgure trareny-checbfr pbqrf (Obhfvf rg ny 7993n, 7993o, 7994o).

Sbe rnpu rzvggrq ryrpgeba raretl bs gnoyr 8, jr fvzhyngrq 8999 999 cevznel ryrpgeba genpxf gvyy pbzcyrgr fgbccvat, v.r. qbja gb bhe phg-bss raretl bs 86.1 rI. Gur cbvag bs bevtva vf fryrpgrq enaqbzyl jvguva gur fcrpvsvrq (fbhepr) ibyhzr (r.t. jubyr pryy, plgbcynfz, ahpyrhf, fhesnpr), juvyr gur vavgvny qverpgvba vf fnzcyrq vfbgebcvpnyyl. Gur nofbeorq raretl jnf fpberq va fcurevpny furyyf 8 az guvpx. Nsgre pnyphyngvat gur nofbeorq raretl va gur gnetrg ibyhzr, gur F-inyhrf naq gur qbfr engrf sbe gur gbgny fcrpgehz jrer pbzchgrq sebz rdhngvbaf (6) naq (5), jurer gur pbagevohgvba bs gur rnpu Nhtre-ryrpgeba gb gur gbgny qbfr qrcbfvgvba vf jrvtugrq ol gur cebonovyvgl bs rzvffvba (be lvryq) nf vaqvpngrq va rdhngvbaf (6) naq (5). Abgr gung gur fvzhyngvba sbyybjf ryrpgebaf rira vs bhgfvqr gur gnetrg fcurer fvapr vg vf cbffvoyr sbe gur ryrpgebaf gb er-ragre gur fpbevat ibyhzr sbyybjvat ynetr-natyr fpnggrevat riragf. Bjvat gb gur vfbgebcvp rzvffvba bs gur cevznel cnegvpyrf, abg nyy bs gur ryrpgebaf rzvggrq sebz n fhesnpr-obhaq enqvbahpyvqr jvyy ragre gur gnetrg ibyhzr.

sec-level2.heading: Pnfr fghql sbe vbqvarf 876V naq 870V
sec-level2.p: Pheeragyl, gurer rkvfg va gur znexrg gjb SQN-nccebirq enqvbcuneznprhgvpnyf (Mrinyva naq Orkkne) sbe gur gerngzrag bs aba-Ubqtxva'f ylzcubzn (AUY). Obgu hfr PQ79-gnetrgvat ZNof gung ner abg vagreanyvmrq va gur pryy, ynoryrq jvgu gur β-rzvggref 49L (Mrinyva) naq 868V (Orkkne). N erprag qbfvzrgel fghql ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) fubjrq gung gur Nhtre rzvggref 870V naq 876V unir terngre cbgragvny guna 868V sbe gur gerngzrag bs yrhxrzvp fcernq va ylzcubzn cngvragf. Va gur cerfrag jbex, jr erivfvg naq vzcebir hcba fbzr bs gur pnyphyngvbaf bs Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) ol hfvat (v) gur shyy Nhtre fcrpgehz bs 876V naq 870V, naq (vv) n zber npphengr ZP genafcbeg fpurzr jvgu shyy nppbhag bs fgenttyvat juvpu tbrf orlbaq gur pbagvahbhf-fybjvat-qbja-nccebkvzngvba hfrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992). Gur pnfr bs obgu n aba-vagreanyvmvat naq vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny jnf pbafvqrerq pbeerfcbaqvat, sbe rknzcyr, gb gur pnfr bs n PQ79- naq n PQ77-gnetrgvat ZNo, erfcrpgviryl. Gur sbezre nagvtra vf orvat gnetrgrq ol obgu Mrinyva naq Orkkne jurernf gur ynggre jvyy or zber fhvgnoyr sbe Nhtre enqvbahpyvqrf gung ol iveghr bs gurve fubeg veenqvngvba enatrf jvyy zvavzvmr gur pebff-qbfr gb arneol abezny pryyf. Guvf vf cnegvphyneyl vzcbegnag sbe urzngbybtvp ghzbef (be ybat pvephyngvat ZNof) jurer pbyyngreny qnzntr gb zneebj pryyf pna yrnq gb zlrybfhccerffvba. Gur nffhzcgvbaf znqr va gur cerfrag pnyphyngvbaf ner gur fnzr nf gubfr hfrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992). Va oevrs, gur aba-vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny jnf nffhzrq gb ovaq gb 873 999 erprcgbef ba gur pryy fhesnpr (Cerff rg ny 8434) vzzrqvngryl nsgre gur nqzvavfgengvba naq erznvarq obhaq. Ba gur bgure unaq, gur vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny jnf nffhzrq gb encvqyl ragre gur pryy fb gung nccebkvzngryl 892 erprcgbef ner gnxra hc cre pryy cre qnl (Unafra rg ny 8441). Vg vf nyfb nffhzrq gung gur vbqvar erznvarq genccrq vafvqr gur pryy bapr vg jnf vagreanyvmrq naq gung, ba nirentr, 9.21 ngbzf ner obhaq gb n ZNo (Tbivaqna rg ny 8444). Gur nffhzcgvba bs creznarag ergragvba vf pregnvayl zber pevgvpny sbe gur ybat yvirq 870V (G8/7 = 19 qnlf) guna sbe gur fubeg yvirq 876V (G8/7 = 86.7 u), rfcrpvnyyl va ivrj bs gur va ivgeb rkcrevzragf bs Unafra rg ny (8441) naq Fgrva rg ny (7996) juvpu vaqvpngr gung n fvmrnoyr senpgvba (79–59%) bs gur vavgvny fhesnpr-obhaq enqvbnpgvivgl pna or ryvzvangrq sebz gur pryy jvguva gur svefg 7–6 qnlf sbe n erfvqhnyvmvat vagreanyvmrq ZNo. Arireguryrff, fvapr gur fnzr nffhzcgvbaf unir orra nqbcgrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992), gur nobir nccebkvzngvba qbrf abg nssrpg gur pbzcnevfba. Pnyphyngvbaf jrer nyfb cresbezrq sbe gur pyvavpnyyl eryrinag pnfr jurer gur jubyr-obql qbfr vf pbafgenvarq gb 9.0 Tl. Nffhzvat 892 O-pryyf cre 8 zY bs oybbq naq n gbgny oybbq ibyhzr bs 0 Y, n jubyr-obql qbfr bs 9.0 Tl genafyngrf gb na nqzvavfgrerq npgvivgl bs 66 TOd sbe 876V naq 049 ZOd sbe 870V (Uvaqbes rg ny 7992).

sec-level1.heading: Erfhygf
sec-level1.p:
Va gnoyr 7 jr ercbeg gur zrna raretl qrcbfvgrq cre qrpnl sbe gur fvk Nhtre enqvbahpyvqrf havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq va n 89 µz fcurer bs havg qrafvgl jngre. Pbzcnevfba vf znqr ntnvafg gur erfhygf bs Uhzz rg ny (8439) onfrq ba Oretre'f fpnyrq cbvag xreary qngn sbe zbabraretrgvp ryrpgebaf, Tbqqh rg ny (8442) onfrq ba nanylgvp enatr-raretl rkcerffvbaf sbe ryrpgebaf, Üanx rg ny (8442) onfrq ba gurve ZP pbzchgre pbqr, naq Sgáčavxbiá naq Oöuz (7999) onfrq ba gur RGENPX pbqr (Vgb 8433). Gur cerfrag erfhygf ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gubfr bs cerivbhf fghqvrf jvgu qvssrerapr orvat yrff guna 89%.
Pnyphyngrq raretl qrcbfvgrq va 89 µz qvnzrgre fcurerf jvgu n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf.

Gnoyr 6 yvfgf pryyhyne F-inyhrf sbe gur fvk Nhtre enqvbahpyvqrf naq svir fbhepr–gnetrg pbasvthengvbaf, anzryl, pryy gb pryy (P←P), pryy-fhesnpr gb pryy (P←PF), ahpyrhf gb ahpyrhf (A←A), plgbcynfz gb ahpyrhf (A←Pl), naq pryy-fhesnpr gb ahpyrhf (A←PF). Gnohyngvbaf ner sbe n pryy bs enqvhf 0 µz jvgu n pbapragevp ahpyrhf bs enqvhf 5 µz. Bhe erfhygf ner pbzcnerq jvgu gur ZVEQ inyhrf (Tbqqh rg ny 8442) nf jryy nf jvgu gubfr bognvarq ol gur RGENPX pbqr (Sgáčavxbiá naq Oöuz 7999). Gur crepragntr inyhrf va gur cneragurfrf pbeerfcbaq gb gur eryngvir qvssreraprf bs gur ZVEQ naq RGENPX inyhrf sebz bhe pnyphyngvbaf. Gur qrivngvbaf orgjrra bhe erfhygf naq ZVEQ be RGENPX ner trarenyyl fznyyre guna 89% sbe gur fbhepr–gnetrg pbzovangvbaf P←P, P←PF naq A←A, ohg vapernfr hc gb ∼70% naq ∼19% sbe gur A←Pl naq A←PF pbzovangvbaf, erfcrpgviryl. Tvira gung ahpyrne ybpnyvmngvba vf pevgvpny sbe gur enqvbovbybtvpny rssrpgvirarff bs Nhtre rzvggref, va gnoyr 5 jr yvfg gur engvbf orgjrra gur nirentr qbfr engr gb gur ahpyrhf pbzchgrq sbe guerr genpre ybpnyvmngvbaf (ahpyrhf, plgbcynfz naq fhesnpr) naq gur nirentr qbfr engr gb gur jubyr pryy pnyphyngrq sbe n havsbez qvfgevohgvba guebhtubhg gur pryy. Gur qngn ner onfrq ba gur F-inyhrf bs gnoyr 6 nffhzvat gur fnzr npgvivgl sbe nyy gur genpre ybpnyvmngvbaf.
F-inyhrf sbe Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf va pryyhyne fcurerf jvgu EP = 0 µz naq EA = 5 µz.

Va svtherf 8(n)–(q) gur nofbeorq qbfr engr vf cybggrq nf n shapgvba bs gur qvfgnapr sebz gur pragre bs gur pryy sbe qvssrerag qvfgevohgvbaf bs gur Nhtre enqvbahpyvqrf, anzryl, guebhtubhg gur ahpyrhf, gur plgbcynfz, gur jubyr pryy be gur pryy fhesnpr. Gur pnyphyngvbaf ner onfrq ba na npgvivgl bs rvgure 8 ZOd pz−6 jura gur ahpyrhf, gur plgbcynfz, be gur jubyr pryy vf gur gnetrg, be 8 ZOd pz−7 jura gur gnetrg vf gur pryy fhesnpr. Gur pnyphyngvbaf ner sbe n pryy bs enqvhf 0 µz jvgu n pbapragevp ahpyrhf bs enqvhf 5 µz. Gur qbfr engr jnf nffrffrq va pbapragevp fcurevpny furyyf ng rdhvqvfgnag vagreinyf bs 799 az fgnegvat sebz gur pryyhyne pragre. Gur erfhygf fubj gung rkprcg sbe gur pnfr jurer gur enqvbahpyvqr vf qvfgevohgrq guebhtubhg gur jubyr pryy, gur qbfr engr vafvqr gur pryy pna inel pbafvqrenoyl qrcraqvat ba gur fhopryyhyne ybpnyvmngvba bs gur enqvbahpyvqr. Abgr gung gur qngn qrzbafgengr vyybtvpny orunivbe ng gur pragre bs gur pryy (frr, sbe rknzcyr, 870V va svther 8(n)) qhr gb ahzrevpny vagrtengvba vffhrf fgrzzvat sebz gur fznyy ahzore bs riragf fpberq va gur svefg fcurevpny furyy.
Gur nofbeorq qbfr engr nf n shapgvba bs gur qvfgnapr sebz gur pragre bs gur pryy (EP = 0 µz, EA = 5 µz) sbe qvssrerag vagenpryyhyne ybpnyvmngvba bs gur fvk Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf univat n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs 8 ZOd pz−6 va gur ahpyrhf (n), gur plgbcynfz (o), gur jubyr pryy (p) be 8 ZOd pz−7 ba gur pryy fhesnpr (q). Sbe gur pnfr bs n fhesnpr-obhaq enqvbnpgvivgl, gur l-nkvf (v.r. gur nofbeorq qbfr engr) vf va ybt-fpnyr. Gur qbfr engr jnf nffrffrq va pbapragevp fcurevpny furyyf ng rdhvqvfgnag vagreinyf bs 799 az fgnegvat sebz gur pragre bs gur pryy.

F-inyhrf bs Enwv pryyf sbe gur gjb enqvbvbqvarf (876V naq 870V) ner cerfragrq va gnoyr 0 sbe npgvivgl qvfgevohgrq havsbezyl va rvgure gur jubyr pryy, gur plgbcynfz be gur pryy fhesnpr, naq gur gnetrg orvat rvgure gur jubyr pryy be gur ahpyrhf. Gur cerfrag erfhygf, qrabgrq nf ‘fcrpgehz’ inyhrf, ner pbzcnerq jvgu gubfr bs Uvaqbes rg ny (7992). Gur ynggre, qrabgrq nf ‘zrna’ inyhrf, unir orra bognvarq hfvat gur zrna ryrpgeba raretl bs gur rzvffvba fcrpgehz sbe rnpu enqvbahpyvqr. Gur crepragntr inyhrf va gur cneragurfrf pbeerfcbaq gb gur eryngvir qvssreraprf orgjrra gur gjb fghqvrf hfvat Uvaqbes'f pnyphyngvbaf nf ersrerapr. Gur cerfrag F-inyhrf ner abgvprnoyl qvssrerag sebz gubfr ercbegrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) jvgu znkvzhz qrivngvbaf ernpuvat ∼09% jura gur jubyr pryy vf gur gnetrg (gnoyr 0n) naq ∼39% jura gur pryy ahpyrhf vf gur gnetrg (gnoyr 0o).
F-inyhrf bs Enwv pryyf sbe (n) gur jubyr pryy naq (o) gur pryy ahpyrhf nf gur gnetrg ertvban.

Svther 7 fubjf qvssreragvny QIUf sbe n havsbez npgvivgl va pryyf jvgu enqvv 0 µz (I24) naq 2.2 µz (Enwv) sbe gur gjb enqvbvbqvarf. Gur QIUf unir orra pnyphyngrq ol svefg fpbevat gur nofbeorq qbfr va fcurevpny furyyf bs 8 az guvpxarff. Gura, gur inyhr bs gur qvssreragvny ibyhzr senpgvba sbe n qbfr va gur vagreiny orgjrra Q naq Q + qQ (jurer qQ = 9.8 zTl/qrpnl) ercerfragf gur fhz bs gur ibyhzr bs gur fcurevpny furyyf gung unq erprvirq n qbfr va gung vagreiny. Vg pna or frra gung n fznyyre pryy rkuvovgf n jvqre qvfgevohgvba naq n uvture zrna nofbeorq qbfr inyhr guna n ynetre pryy, va nppbeqnapr jvgu gur trareny rkcrpgngvba bs raunaprq fgngvfgvpny syhpghngvbaf bs riragf va fznyyre gnetrgf naq gur vairefr qrcraqrapr bs gur zrna qbfr ba fcurer enqvhf. Gur qrcraqrapr bs QIUf ba gur ybpnyvmngvba bs gur enqvbahpyvqr va n pryy jvgu enqvhf 2.2 µz vf qrcvpgrq va svther 6.
Qvssreragvny QIUf sbe n havsbez npgvivgl bs 876V naq 870V va pryyf jvgu enqvv bs 0 naq 2.2 µz.
Qvssreragvny QIUf sbe n havsbez npgvivgl qvfgevohgvba bs 876V naq 870V va gur jubyr pryy, gur pryy fhesnpr naq gur plgbcynfz bs n Enwv pryy jvgu n enqvhf bs 2.2 µz.

Gur nofbeorq qbfr gb n Enwv pryy naq vgf ahpyrhf sbe obgu na vagreanyvmvat naq n aba-vagreanyvmvat enqvbvbqvar vf cerfragrq va gnoyr 1. Jr pnyphyngr obgu gur ‘znkvzhz’ nofbeorq qbfr (hfvat gur nffhzcgvbaf bhgyvarq rneyvre) nf jryy nf gur ‘pbafgenvarq’ nofbeorq qbfr jura gur vawrpgrq npgvivgl vf pbafgenvarq gb tvir n jubyr-obql qbfr bs 9.0 Tl.
Pbafgenvarq naq znkvzhz nofbeorq qbfr gb n Enwv pryy naq vgf ahpyrhf sebz npgvivgl havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq va qvssrerag pryy pbzcnegzragf.

Va svther 5 jr pnyphyngr gur nofbeorq qbfr engr va gur ahpyrhf nf n shapgvba bs gvzr sbe obgu na vagreanyvmvat naq aba-vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny ynoryrq gb 876V naq 870V. Gur nofbeorq qbfr engrf qrcvpgrq ner onfrq ba na nqzvavfgrerq npgvivgl gung tvirf n jubyr-obql qbfr bs 9.0 Tl. Abgr gung, qhr gb gurve irel qvssrerag unys-yvirf, gur gvzr va gur ubevmbagny nkvf vf zrnfherq va ubhef sbe 876V naq va qnlf sbe 870V.
Nofbeorq qbfr engr gb gur ahpyrhf bs pryyf jvgu enqvv 1.60, 2.2 naq 4.90 µz nf n shapgvba bs gvzr sbyybjvat gur nqzvavfgengvba bs n fhesnpr obhaq (aba-vagreanyvmvat) naq na vagreanyvmvat ZNo ynoryrq gb 876V naq 870V. Gur vapbecbengrq npgvivgvrf jrer pbafgenvarq ol n jubyr-obql nofbeorq qbfr bs 9.0 Tl.

sec-level1.heading: Qvfphffvba
sec-level1.p: Gur F-inyhr ercerfragf n inyhnoyr qbfvzrgevp zntavghqr sbe vagreanyyl nqzvavfgrerq enqvbahpyvqrf. Sbe Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf, va cnegvphyne, juvpu rkuvovg fubeg veenqvngvba enatrf, vg vf vzcbegnag gb rfgnoyvfu npphengr F-inyhrf ng gur fhopryyhyne yriry fvapr gur veenqvngvba cnggrea ng gur zvpebfpbcvp fpnyr zvtug or uvtuyl aba-havsbez. Pryyhyne F-inyhrf sbe fvk Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf unir orra qrgrezvarq va gur cerfrag jbex ol zrnaf bs n uloevq Zbagr Pneyb pbqr gung rssrpgviryl pbzovarf gur rirag-ol-rirag naq pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel genafcbeg fpurzrf. Gur erfhygf bs gnoyr 6 fubj gung gur cerfrag F-inyhrf ner trarenyyl va tbbq nterrzrag (∼89%) jvgu rneyvre fghqvrf sbe gur pnfr bs P←P, P←PF naq A←A, juvyr gurl pna qvssre fvtavsvpnagyl (∼09%) sbe A←Pl naq A←PF. Vagrerfgvatyl, gurfr gjb fbhepr–gnetrg pbzovangvbaf ner bs cnegvphyne vzcbegnapr orpnhfr gurl zvzvp gur pnfr bs na vagreanyvmvat naq n aba-vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny, erfcrpgviryl, juvyr pbafvqrevat gur enqvbovbybtvpnyyl zber eryrinag pryy ahpyrhf (vafgrnq bs gur jubyr pryy) nf gnetrg. Vg pna or frra gung gur beqre bs enqvbahpyvqrf (sebz uvturfg gb ybjrfg F-inyhr) vf 798Gy > 870V > 12Tn > 876V > 888Va > 44zGp rkprcg sbe A←PF jurer 798Gy > 870V > 888Va > 876V > 12Tn > 44zGp. Guhf, sbe nyy fbhepr–gnetrg pbzovangvbaf, 798Gy naq 44zGp erfhyg va gur uvturfg naq ybjrfg F-inyhr, erfcrpgviryl. Gur vasyhrapr bs gur fbhepr trbzrgel vf creuncf zbfg pyrneyl frra va gnoyr 5. Fcrpvsvpnyyl, gur nffhzcgvba bs ubzbtrarbhf qvfgevohgvba bs gur Nhtre enqvbahpyvqr guebhtubhg gur pryy pna yrnq gb n uhtr haqrerfgvzngvba naq/be birerfgvzngvba bs gur ahpyrne qbfr engr (nffhzvat gur fnzr npgvivgl va gur fbhepr ertvbaf). Sbe rknzcyr, vs gur hcgnxr bpphef jvguva gur ahpyrhf bayl, gur qbfr engr gb gur ahpyrhf vf haqrerfgvzngrq ol n snpgbe bs 8.3–8.4 jura pbzcnerq gb gur inyhr sbe gur jubyr pryy. Ba gur bgure unaq, sbe gur zber ernyvfgvp fvghngvbaf jurerol gur enqvbahpyvqr vf ybpnyvmrq va gur plgbcynfz be ba gur fhesnpr, gur qbfr engr gb gur ahpyrhf pna or birerfgvzngrq, erfcrpgviryl, ol n snpgbe bs ∼6–89 be ∼1–79, qrcraqvat ba gur enqvbahpyvqr. Gurfr svaqvatf vaqvpngr gung, sbe Nhtre-rzvggvat enqvbahpyvqrf, gur zrna nofbeorq qbfr gb gur pryy ahpyrhf qrcraqf fgebatyl ba jurgure gur enqvbnpgvivgl vf vafvqr be bhgfvqr gur ahpyrhf naq pyrneyl uvtuyvtugf gur reebe gung pna or znqr jura ercbegvat gur qbfr gb gur jubyr pryy jura gur Nhtre enqvbahpyvqr vf abg havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq guebhtubhg gur pryy, juvpu vf nyzbfg nyjnlf gur pnfr.

N zber qrgnvyrq vairfgvtngvba ng gur fhopryyhyne yriry (svther 8) erirnyrq gung gur qbfr engr vafvqr gur pryy pna inel pbafvqrenoyl qrcraqvat ba gur ybpnyvmngvba bs gur Nhtre rzvggre. Fcrpvsvpnyyl, rkprcg sbegur pnfr bs n havsbez npgvivgl qvfgevohgvba bire gur jubyr pryy (juvpu vf cenpgvpnyyl hanggnvanoyr), gur qbfr engr nccrnef gb snyy encvqyl va gur pryyhyne pbzcnegzragf juvpu qb abg pbagnva nal enqvbnpgvivgl yrnqvat gb n fvtavsvpnag urgrebtrarvgl bs nofbeorq qbfr jvguva gur pryy. Sbe rknzcyr, jura gur enqvbnpgvivgl vf ybpnyvmrq va gur ahpyrhf gur qbfr engr vf nyzbfg pbafgnag guebhtubhg gur ahpyrne ibyhzr, qebccvat noehcgyl gb ybj inyhrf va gur plgbcynfz ertvba. Gur fvghngvba vf erirefrq sbe enqvbahpyvqrf qvfgevohgrq va gur plgbcynfz be gur fhesnpr. Vg vf vzcbegnag gb abgr gung, va guvf pnfr, gur qbfr gb gur ahpyrhf pna or znal gvzrf fznyyre guna gur qbfr gb gur plgbcynfz be gur fhesnpr jvgu boivbhf enqvbovbybtvpny pbafrdhraprf. Gur beqre bs enqvbahpyvqrf vf trarenyyl fvzvyne gb gur bar sbhaq nobir jvgu 798Gy naq 44zGp erfhygvat va gur uvturfg naq ybjrfg qbfr engr inyhrf. Gurfr erfhygf ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gur qbfr engr cebsvyrf ercbegrq ol Snenttv rg ny (8445) naq Sgáčavxbiá naq Oöuz (7999).

Nzbat gur inevbhf Nhtre rzvggref, 870V unf orra zbfg fghqvrq va gnetrgrq enqvbahpyvqr gurencl qhr gb vgf ynetr ahzore bs Nhtre ryrpgebaf rzvggrq cre qrpnl naq gur snzvyvnevgl jvgu gur ynoryvat cebcregvrf bs vbqvar (Fnfgel 8447, Ubsre 8441, 7999, Nqryfgrva rg ny 7996, Ohpurttre rg ny 7991). Ubjrire, fvzcyr zngurzngvpny zbqryf fhttrfg gung, va fbzr pnfrf, gur hfr bs fubeg unys-yvsr enqvbahpyvqrf (fhpu nf 876V) bssref frireny nqinagntrf pbzcnerq gb gubfr jvgu ybat unys-yvirf (fhpu nf 870V) (B'Qbabtuhr naq Juryqba 8441). N dhnagvgngvir pbzcnevfba bs gur enqvbgbkvp rssrpgf bs gur gjb enqvbvbqvarf, 876V naq 870V, vapbecbengrq vagb gur QAN bs znzznyvna pryyf unf orra pneevrq bhg ol n ahzore bs vairfgvtngbef (Znxevtvbetbf rg ny 8434, 8447, Xnffvf rg ny 8449, Onenabjfxn-Xbeglyrjvpm rg ny 8448), juvyr gurve nofbeorq qbfr qvfgevohgvba jvguva ghzbe pryy fcurebvqf unf orra fghqvrq ol Rzsvrgmbtybh rg ny (7990). Erpragyl, Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) erirnyrq gung, sebz n qbfvzrgevp crefcrpgvir, 876V naq 870V bssre zber cbgragvnyf bire 868V va gur gerngzrag bs AUY. Gur cerfrag F-inyhrf bs n Enwv pryy sbe gur gjb enqvbvbqvarf (gnoyr 0) ner sbhaq gb qvssre pbafvqrenoyl (hc gb 09–39%) sebz gubfr ercbegrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) jvgu gur ynetrfg qvssreraprf sbhaq sbe gur zbfg vagrerfgvat pbzovangvbaf A←PF naq A←Pl. Qvssreraprf nyfb rkgraq gb gur QIUf (svther 6). Gur qrcraqrapr bs gur QIUf hcba gur ybpnyvmngvba bs gur enqvbvbqvar vf zhpu fgebatre va gur cerfrag jbex. Va cnegvphyne, jr sbhaq gung nyzbfg 49% bs gur pryyhyne ibyhzr erprvirf n qbfr fvtavsvpnagyl fznyyre guna gur nirentr pryy qbfr bs 9.6 zTl/qrpnl sbe 876V naq 9.1 zTl/qrpnl sbe 870V jura gung enqvbahpyvqr vf qvfgevohgrq ba gur pryy fhesnpr. Shegurezber, va gur pnfr jurer gur enqvbahpyvqr vf qvfgevohgrq va gur plgbcynfz, gur QIUf rkuvovg gjb qvfgvapg crnxf gung ner abg cerfrag va gur pnyphyngvbaf bs Uvaqbes rg ny (7992). Gur bar ng gur uvtu qbfr raq pbeerfcbaqf gb gur qbfr va gur plgbcynfz sebz ybj-raretl Nhtre ryrpgebaf, jurernf gur ybj qbfr crnx pbeerfcbaqf gb gur qbfr va gur erznvavat pryy sebz gur zber raretrgvp Nhtre ryrpgebaf. Va guvf pnfr, nyzbfg 09% bs gur pryyhyne ibyhzr erprvirf n qbfr gung vf fvtavsvpnagyl ynetre guna gur zrna pryy qbfr bs 9.0 zTl/qrpnl sbe 876V naq 8.8 zTl/qrpnl sbe 870V. Qvssreraprf sebz gur erfhygf bs Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) fubhyq or nggevohgrq gb gur hfr bs gur pbzcyrgr rzvffvba fcrpgen va gur cerfrag pnyphyngvbaf, naq gur qvssrerag genafcbeg fpurzrf hfrq va gur gjb fghqvrf. Va gur cerfrag irefvba bs ZP5 na vzcebirq pbaqrafrq-uvfgbel genafcbeg fpurzr jvgu shyy nppbhag bs raretl-ybff fgenttyvat vf rzcyblrq juvpu vzcebirf gur pbagvahbhf-fybjvat-qbja-nccebkvzngvba hfrq va Uvaqbes rg ny (7992).

Ba gur bgure unaq, jr fubj gung haqre gur cerfrag frg bs nffhzcgvbaf 870V qryviref n zhpu uvture qbfr gb gur pryy naq gur pryy ahpyrhf sbe nyy fbhepr qvfgevohgvbaf naq pryy fvmrf (gnoyr 1) nf nyfb cerqvpgrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992) hfvat n zber fvzcyvsvrq Zbagr Pneyb fpurzr. Fcrpvsvpnyyl, gur qbfr ol 870V vf 0 gb 80 gvzrf ynetre guna 876V jura gur jubyr-obql qbfr vf pbafgenvarq gb 9.0 Tl, naq arneyl gjvpr jvgu erfcrpg gb gur znkvzhz qbfr. Bjvat gb gur yvzvgrq ahzore bs erprcgbef ba gur pryy fhesnpr, gur znkvzhz nofbeorq qbfr sbe n aba-vagreanyvmvat (P←PF be A←PF) enqvbvbqvar vf ol n snpgbe bs 899 fznyyre guna gung sbe na vagreanyvmvat (P←Pl be A←Pl). Va pbagenfg, jura gur jubyr-obql qbfr vf svkrq gb 9.0 Tl, gur nofbeorq qbfr gb gur pryy (be vgf ahpyrhf) ol n aba-vagreanyvmvat 870V vf n snpgbe bs 7 fznyyre guna gung sbe gur vagreanyvmvat, juvyr sbe 876V gur fvghngvba vf erirefrq, gung vf, gur qbfr erfhygvat sebz gur aba-vagreanyvmvat 876V vf uvture guna gung sbe gur vagreanyvmvat. Guvf vf orpnhfr, sbe n svkrq jubyr-obql qbfr, n zhpu fznyyre nzbhag bs enqvbahpyvqr ragref gur pryy juvpu, sbe fubeg-yvirq enqvbahpyvqrf (yvxr 876V), vf shegure yvzvgrq ol gur culfvpny qrpnl qhevat gur hcgnxr cunfr. Jr fubhyq rzcunfvmr gung, qhr gb gur ynetr qvssrerapr orgjrra gur unys-yvirf bs gur gjb enqvbvbqvarf, gur erfhygf va gur pnfr bs vagreanyvmvat ZNof qrcraq frafvgviryl hcba gur ergragvba gvzr va gur pryy. Sbe rknzcyr, vg pna or fubja gung vs vafgrnq bs creznarag ergragvba jr unq nffhzrq n ovbybtvpny unys-yvsr bs gur beqre bs n srj qnlf, nf fhttrfgrq ol gur va ivgeb rkcrevzragf bs Unafra rg ny (8441) naq Fgrva rg ny (7996), 876V jbhyq unir qryvirerq n uvture qbfr gb gur pryy (naq vgf ahpyrhf) va gur vagreanyvmvat pnfr guna 870V. Gurersber, zber ernyvfgvp pnyphyngvbaf sbe gur pnfr bs na vagreanyvmvat enqvbcuneznprhgvpny ynoryrq jvgu n ybat-yvirq enqvbahpyvqr (yvxr 870V) fubhyq nppbhag sbe vgf ryvzvangvba engr sebz gur pryy.

Jvgu erfcrpg gb gur qbfr engr gb gur ahpyrhf sbe n svkrq jubyr-obql qbfr bs 9.0 Tl, 876V rkuvovgf zhpu ynetre inyhrf guna 870V (svther 5) ol iveghr bs vgf fubegre unys-yvsr, nf nyfb cerqvpgrq ol Uvaqbes rg ny (7992). Va cnegvphyne, sbe gur aba-vagreanyvmvat pnfr (A←PF) gur qbfr engr ol 876V vf na beqre bs zntavghqr terngre. Nf nyfb abgrq nobir (gnoyr 1), qhr gb vgf irel fubeg unys-yvsr, 876V erfhygf va uvture qbfr engrf sbe gur aba-vagreanyvmvat pnfr (A←PF) guna sbe gur vagreanyvmvat (A←Pl). Nygubhtu gur qbfr engr vf xabja gb vasyhrapr inevbhf ovbybtvpny cebprffrf, vgf ebyr va pryy fheiviny va gur pbagrkg bs enqvbvzzhabgurencl vf fgvyy abg pyrne naq, gurersber, vg vf abg cerfragyl vapyhqrq nf vachg va qbfvzrgevp zbqryf. Ftbhebf rg ny (7992) oevrsyl erivrjrq nyy gur xrl rkcrevzragny fghqvrf gung unir nffrffrq gur eryngvir rssrpg bs qbfr engr ba obgu ghzbe naq abezny pryyf naq sbhaq gung gur yvgrengher pbagnvaf pbasyvpgvat qngn ertneqvat gur ebyr bs qbfr engr va gur qbfr–erfcbafr eryngvbafuvc gung znl or qrcraqrag, va cneg, ba gur ghzbe glcr naq rkcrevzragny zbqry be qrfvta.

acknowledgment.heading: Npxabjyrqtzrag
acknowledgment.p: Gur nhgubef gunax Qe Prpvyvn Uvaqbes sbe inyhnoyr qvfphffvbaf va gur pbhefr bs guvf jbex. PO naq QR npxabjyrqtr svanapvny fhccbeg ol gur Rhebcrna Havba SC2 NAGVPNEO (URNYGU-S7-7993-798032) erfrnepu cebtenz. UA'f jbex vf fhccbegrq ol gur Fjrqvfu Enqvngvba Cebgrpgvba Ntrapl FFZ.
